Package org.patheloper.api.pathing.strategy

Interface PathfinderStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
BoatStrategy, DirectPathfinderStrategy, JumpablePathfinderStrategy, PlayerWalkableStrategy, WalkablePathfinderStrategy
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface PathfinderStrategy
A functional interface to modify the internal behaviour and choosing of the Pathfinder.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    cleanup()
    Cleans up the resources used during the pathfinding process.
    boolean
    isValid(@NonNull PathValidationContext pathValidationContext)
    Returns whether the given PathPosition is valid.

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      boolean isValid(@NonNull @NonNull PathValidationContext pathValidationContext)
      Returns whether the given PathPosition is valid.
      Parameters:
      pathValidationContext - The context providing essentials needed for path validation

    • cleanup

      default void cleanup()
      Cleans up the resources used during the pathfinding process. This method is guaranteed to always be called after pathfinding and should be overridden to ensure proper disposal of resources. Users can rely on the fact that this method will be invoked post pathfinding to do necessary clean-ups.
